price: Nokorε sε yεwͻ fekuo bi wͻ (Yudafoͻ) no mu a wͻ’dane wͻn kεtrεma wͻ Nwoma no mu nsεm no ho, sεdeε mobεdwen sε efri Nwoma no mu, nanso enfri Nwoma no mu. Wͻ’san kasε, efri Nyankopͻn hͻ, aberε nso a enfri Nyankopͻn hͻ; wͻ’ka atorͻsεm to Nyankopͻn so wͻ aberε a wͻ’nim (sε εnyε nokorε).
arabic: وَإِنَّ مِنۡهُمۡ لَفَرِيقٗا يَلۡوُۥنَ أَلۡسِنَتَهُم بِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِتَحۡسَبُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَمَا هُوَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَيَقُولُونَ هُوَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا هُوَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَيَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-inna min'hum lafarīqan yalwūna alsinatahum bil-kitābi litaḥsabūhu mina al-kitābi wamā huwa mina al-kitābi wayaqūlūna huwa min ʿindi al-lahi wamā huwa min ʿindi al-lahi wayaqūlūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wahum yaʿlamūna
translations: so that you may think it
